properties.entry: Just a spoon full of Tiramisu

It was one of these beautiful summer days. Emma got herself ready to drive to the office. While opening the outside door she suddenly turned around, stopped for a moment, and then hurriedly ran back to her bedroom. She vehemently pulled the wardrobe door open because all of a sudden she remembered that she’d have a date after work and before her company’s summer party.
It was supposed to be one of these countless blind dates, which she was sick of and bored already. However she wanted to be well prepared and she decided to choose her outfit suitable for the special event.  So she chose a short summer dress that accentuates her body very well. The shoes fitting to her dress were found quickly and so she was ready to face the day in front of her.
